GoalDesc: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
TargetDesc: By 2030, expand international cooperation and capacity-building support to developing countries in water- and sanitation-related activities and programmes, including water harvesting, desalination, water efficiency, wastewater treatment, recycling and reuse technologies
IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Commitments; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Commitments; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million

IndicatorDesc: Amount of water- and sanitation-related official development assistance that is part of a government-coordinated spending plan
SeriesDesc: Total official development assistance (gross disbursement) for water supply and sanitation, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
Footnotes: Gross disbursements; Based on OECD, CRS databased, 2018; Constant 2016 USD million
